title: TiKV Max Resolved TS stop to advance when restore / import data into tikv
body: ## Bug Report ### What version of TiKV are you using? nightly build-2022, 11, 23 ### What operating system and CPU are you using? centos ### Steps to reproduce 1. create a tidb cluster 2. restore data into cluster ### What did you expect? max resolved ts shall advance as resolved_ts did ### What did happened? max resolved ts stop to advance it impact backup and restore, auto_dr_sync etc, those using max resolved ts function.

comments_data.body: After the error happens, new created cdc changefeed  is not able to advance. Escalate it to major.
